content: I've heard great things about Black Mirror, I'll definitely add it to my watchlist. I've also been meaning to check out The Haunting of Hill House, since I've seen a lot of people raving about it. Do you have any recommendations for podcasts that might scratch that same sci-fi itch? I've been listening to a lot of true-crime podcasts lately, like "Last Seen", but I'm open to exploring other genres.
